transcript:
Customer: Mera mulk, mera desh, mera ye watan, shanti ka, unnati ka pyar.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, sir aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji haan ji boliye.
Customer: Ji, sir Rahul baat kar raha tha, main ye keh raha tha aapki Sajid se baat hui thi dobara kya aapki call ke andar?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, sir aawaz aa rahi hai meri?
Customer: Aawaz aa rahi hai, Sajid hai kaun ye?
Executive: Sir aapse aapko jo package diya tha na aap bata rahe the.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir aap, sir aapse baat hui thi na yahan pe Sajid ki kal shaam ko conference ke liye aapke saath mein?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: To baat hui thi unse aapki dobara?
Customer: Dobara baat hui hai meri, nahi.
Executive: Inka mail ID kya hai inki Sajid bhai ki?
Executive: Sir wohi to main aapse puch raha tha ek bari aap puch rahe the mere ko actually mil nahi rahi thi kyunki hamare yahan third party ke bhi log hota hai na.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Ji. Main unse kal se WhatsApp pe dal raha hun bhai sahab mail kar dijiye mere ko aap busy ka install kya kya sab kya kya service denge busy mein mere ko ek mail kar dijiye mail kar dijiye main kal se WhatsApp dal raha hun unko mail nahi karna hai unhe.
Executive: Sir abhi ye bataiye main aapki sari services jo problem hai jo bhi resolution hai main aapko saath ke saath de dunga agar kyunki services yahan se aapko milengi online sir koi physical visit nahi aa payega aapki jaise demand thi is cheez ki to ye main aage se fir aage aapko samjhaun bataun ye sari cheeze kyunki main aapko clear kar dunga aisi koi baat rahegi nahi kyunki hum sare customer ko online hi.
Customer: Haan dekho bhai aapki baat sahi hai lekin main jo hun jyada time phone mein nahi de pata hun kisi ko.
Customer: To main aapko time dunga phone pe to mujhe dikkat ye aati hai call dusron ki aati hai to receive nahi ho paati hai miss call mein reh jaati hai. Kuch call aisi hoti hai jo emergency mein uthane ki hoti hai aapki bhi call nahi aa sakta beech mein baat chal rahi hai beech mein aapki baat rukte hue.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji.
Customer: Us cheez ko maine kaha tha ki aap jo hai jo visit kara dijiye kisi ki main agar banda agar Noida ka banda hai agar usko dikkat aa rahi hai to main jo road ways se kiraya main de dunga.
Executive: Nahi sir ye possible nahi ho payega na sir main tha conference pe kal is cheez mein.
Customer: Nahi nahi aise possible nahi ho payega na sir main tha conference pe kal is cheez mein.
Executive: Lekin woh possibility nahi hai us cheez ki sir.
Customer: Nahi aapke to har shahar mein pehle ek office khula hua tha har city mein.
Executive: Sir office aapka office tha.
Executive: Sir offices hain aisa nahi hai offices nahi hai lekin kuch kuch specific area mein nahi hai sir.
Customer: Are sir aapka Bareilly mein nahi hai jo ki ek jo hai Bareilly ek center hai bahut bada yani ki area hai ye.
Customer: Lucknow hai aapka Bareilly hai Muradabad hai.
Customer: Aapka Muradabad mein bhi koi office nahi hai Bareilly mein bhi office nahi hai.
Customer: Ye mandal hai samjhe Bareilly mandal hai aur Muradabad mandal alag alag mandal mein aapka office nahi hai bataiye.
Executive: Ji, ji, ji.
Customer: To main to aaj to out of station hun to main kal hi baat karta hun agar koi baat karni hai to.
Executive: Sir kal.
Executive: Sir kal aap mujhe matlab kal to actually off rahega yahan pe head office mein hamara.
Customer: To aap mujhe parson parson ka time de dijiye sir.
Customer: Kal chutti hai koi kya?
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji kal chutti rahegi sir.
Customer: Kis cheez ki?
Executive: Sir kal woh hai na ek Guru Nanak Jayanti hai na kal shayad iski wajah se.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Customer: Chalo to parson baat kar lete hain.
Executive: Parson sir parson baat kar lete hain ek chota sa request ye hai ki aap jo hai bas 10 minute 15 minute ke liye online rahega laptop ya desktop.
Customer: Laptop desktop use karte hain aap?
Customer: Main karta hun lekin main jo hun out of station hun main is bare mein abhi koi jyada baat nahi kar paunga.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai sir theek hai koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants Sajid's email ID.

- Customer wants a physical visit.

- Customer states there is no office in Bareilly.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to provide online support.

- Executive informed customer about holiday tomorrow.

- Executive requested customer to be online for 10-15 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call the day after tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- physical visit, email id, offices, support
